```{r}
library(datasets)
data("airquality")
```



```{r}
view(airquality)
```


```{r}
library(naniar)
miss_var_summary(airquality)
```

```{r}
data=na.omit(airquality)
data
```
```{r}
data=data|>
  select(-c(Month, Day))
```


```{r}
pairs(data)
```

```{r}
library(corrplot)
corr_mat=cor(data)
corrplot(corr_mat) # il prend une matrice de corr√©lation.
```

```{r}
reg=lm(data$Ozone~data$Solar.R+data$Wind+data$Temp)
summary(reg)
```
```{r}
y_predict<-predict(reg, newdata = data.frame())
```

Solar.R predit moins l'Ozone.

```{r}
reg2=lm(data$Ozone~data$Wind+data$Temp)
```


```{r}
plot(reg2)
```
```{r}
summary(reg2)
```
Supperposition

```{r}
coeffs=coef(reg2)
coeffs
```

```{r}
y_hat=coeffs[1] + coeffs[2]*data$Wind + coeffs[3]*data$Temp
```
